Uses of Class
jpacman.model.Guest

Packages that use Guest
Package
Description
jpacman.model
This package contains the pacman model: i.e., it contains representations for cells, monsters, the player, the board, the game, etc.

  • Uses of Guest in jpacman.model

    Subclasses of Guest in jpacman.model
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Food
    Food having a number of calories, which can occupy a cell on the board.
    class 
    Monster
    A monster on the board.
    class 
    MovingGuest
    Type for guests with moving capabilities.
    class 
    Player
    The player which can walk around on the board, eat food, and die when meeting a monster.
    class 
    Wall
    A wall positioned on a cell on the board.
